name: Movement Prototypes
description:
This project contains a Unity and Unreal prototype for trying out similar movement systems in both engines. Start a timer and get to any endpoint as fast as possible.

Unreal

-Space to wallclimb/jump, right click to grapple 
-shift runs, control slides/crouches and tab is a short dash
-you can wallrun, wallclimb, grapple, run, slide, dash
-White starts a timer, blue stops the timer 

Unity

-space jumps, left click grapples, shift is a short dash, ctrl slides/crouches
-you can wallrun, wallclimb, grapple, slide, dash
-white starts a timer, red stops the timer
